data.title: Services & Industries
data.text:
Across the globe, private equity clients know that whatever the nature and scope of their fund or deal, they will obtain unsurpassed service from Ropes & Gray’s team of more than 180 private equity lawyers. Our practice runs the gamut from the representation of private equity firms doing classic leveraged buyout deals to the representation of firms managing multi-asset classes.

The private equity industry is rapidly changing, and we are uniquely situated to keep up with the changes. We partner with clients on all types of funds, including:

Buyouts

Special situations

Real estate

Growth and venture

Hedge

Biotech

Our leading practices in private equity transactions, fundraising, investment management, bankruptcy & business restructuring, tax, and finance ensure that we support the industry in all matters to further a firm’s business objectives.

Our expansive practice also includes tailored solutions for our private equity clients across a wide range of matters including FCPA, data privacy, D&O insurance, SEC exams and estate planning.
